trait.name: Duergar Resilience
entries: Nimira has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being {@condition charmed} or {@condition paralyzed}.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, Nimira has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Multiattack. Nimira makes two greatsword attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) slashing damage, or 16 ({@damage 4d6 + 2}) slashing damage while enlarged.

action.name: Enlarge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: For 1 minute, Nimira magically increases in size, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, Nimira is Large, doubles its damage dice on Strength-based weapon attacks (included in the attacks), and makes Strength checks and Strength saving throws with advantage. If Nimira lacks the room to become Large, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

action.name: War Pick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage, or 11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) piercing damage while enlarged.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage, or 9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) piercing damage while enlarged.

action.name: Invisibility (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Nimira magically turns {@condition invisible} until it attacks, casts a spell, or uses its Enlarge, or until its {@status concentration} is broken, up to 1 hour (as if {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell). Any equipment Nimira wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with it.
